# stroke(_:style:)

**Instance Method**

Applies the given shape style to drawn map overlays using the stroke style you specify.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency func stroke(_ content: some ShapeStyle, style: StrokeStyle) -> some MapContent

```

## Parameters

- **content**: The shape style to apply.
- **style**: The stroke style to apply.

## Setting stroke properties

- **stroke(_:lineWidth:)**: Applies the given shape style to drawn map overlays using the line width you specify.
- **stroke(lineWidth:)**: Applies the given stoke drawn map overlays using the line width you specify.
- **strokeStyle(style:)**: Applies the given stroke style to drawn map overlays.
